7.name: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
7.content: >One of the **biggest Student Run NGO's of India**, GYWS (expanding throughout the nation : **[LIGHT](http://light.gyws.org)** majorly functions in the Gopali area near IIT KGP providing quality education to the children of less priviledged sections of the society. Currently the Public Relations Officer here.

8.name: General Motors Techical Center India
8.content: As a Summer Intern was a part of the Electrical Enterprise - Business Planning and Strategy Division. Implemented automation protocols to optimize teh working of the team

9.name: Team Kart
9.content: The **Formula Student** team of **IIT Kharagpur**. I was member of the **Suspension and Brakes** Team here.

10.name: Solar91
10.content: I was a Summer Intern here, gained knowledge on how a Solar EPC functions in the market and manages it's projects in brief.
